markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[High-Quality Scrounger](/Feats.aspx?ID=2060) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 190 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Scrounger](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=75)

**Prerequisites**
[Scrounger Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2058)

</column>

---

When you [Craft](/Actions.aspx?ID=43) a temporary item using Scrounger Dedication, it can be an item of up to 3rd level (though the item must still be a weapon, armor, or a nonconsumable piece of adventuring gear). You can instead Craft it for someone else's use, allowing them to avoid taking the penalty for using a shoddy item when using it, but causing you to take the penalty if you use it.
name: High-Quality Scrounger

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 6" pfs="Standard" > High-Quality Scrounger Source Advanced Player's Guide pg. 190 2.0 Archetype Scrounger Prerequisites Scrounger Dedication --- When you Craft a temporary item using Scrounger Dedication, it can be an item of up to 3rd level (though the item must still be a weapon, armor, or a nonconsumable piece of adventuring gear). You can instead Craft it for someone else's use, allowing them to avoid taking the penalty for using a shoddy item when using it, but causing you to take the penalty if you use it.
